item.title: Zero Step Capturability for Legged Robots in Multi Contact
Experimental Evaluation of Simple Estimators for Humanoid Robots
TALOS: A new humanoid research platform targeted for industrial applications

item.title: High-slope Terrain Locomotion for Torque-Controlled Quadruped Robots
